Package com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model

Class WaterElemental

java.lang.Object
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.WaterElemental
public class WaterElemental
extends com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
This class represents a Character class prototype, suitable for use in a Role-Playing Game. based on student number%10(040983402),and the assigned Character Set 2 Water Elemental vs Mutant Beaver. With Basic Attack ,Frost Attack, Wood Attack
Version:
Java 1.8.0
Author:
Simon Ao
Student ID:040983402
Section:CST8284-312
Update:2021-3-17

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack attack()
    This method generates an Attack from this character, it uses strength + (1 to 8 inclusive) for the damage calculation.
    com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport defend​(com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack attack)
    This method processes an Attack made against this character, to determine if full damage was taken or if the damage was reduced or increased.

    • attack

      public com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack attack()
      This method generates an Attack from this character, it uses strength + (1 to 8 inclusive) for the damage calculation.

    • defend

      public com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport defend​(com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack attack)
      This method processes an Attack made against this character, to determine if full damage was taken or if the damage was reduced or increased. Currently it defaults to keeping the incoming damage amount unchanged.
      Specified by:
      defend in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
      Parameters:
      attack - the Attack against this character
      Returns:
      an AttackReport on how this character defended
